title: 92x13: Frequent Flyer Miles
summary:
The GAO regulations determining that frequent flyer miles received by employees during official travel are agency property do not conflict with OGE's previous advice concerning the acceptance of gifts.  

Notes: [The guidance in this advisory regarding retention of frequent flyer miles is no longer applicable, see Section 1116 of Public Law 107-107, December 28, 2001 and 41 C.F.R. § 301-53.]
